AD.name: default.level
AD.description: The default log level, used for bundles that has not been assigned a specific log level.

AD.name: bundle.log.level
AD.description: Each item is a bundle and a log level separated by a ';'. The bundle part is either a bundle location string, the bundle symbolic name or the bundle name.

AD.name: file
AD.description: Write filtered log entries to file.

AD.name: file.dir
AD.description: Path to the directory to write log file to.

AD.name: file.flush
AD.description: Flush the log file to disc after every new log entry.

AD.name: file.size
AD.description: The maximum size of a log file.

AD.name: file.generations
AD.description: The number of files used by the cyclic log.

AD.name: timestamp.pattern
AD.description: Formating instruction for the time stamp in the log file and on standar out. See java.util.SimpleDateFormat for a description of the pattern.

AD.name: memory.size
AD.description: Number of log entries to keep in memory. These are the entries that the LogReaderService will return.

AD.name: log.out
AD.description: Write log entires to System.out when they are logged.
